lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to live their dream and better their life and the lives of their family.  Knowing I can help people around the world and teach my children to do the same is priceless.

lenders.name: Yakut
lenders.loan_because: I know what it is to be in need. Right now I have the means to help those who can use a little bit of a support, so I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people with using technology in their teaching and learning.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I believe microloans can change the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help companies use computers to improve their business.

lenders.name: Tuomas
lenders.loan_because: I participate in Kiva because I believe in the transformative power of even small amounts of capital applied to the right project.
lenders.occupational_info: Co-founder at Holvi.com

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: There are many people worse off than you or I.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an insurance company

lenders.name: Shelley
lenders.loan_because: We are here to help our brothers and sisters.  Kiva is a great organization because it is not about giving handouts.  It is about helping others support their families through hard work and perserverence.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with a doctor as a team to provide healthcare and health education to patients.

lenders.name: Innovative
lenders.loan_because: This loan program is new and it makes more sense to me. Other humanitarian attempts have not come close to eliminating poverty and some have been tried for centuries. When something does not work try something new like KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur and know how difficult it is to start a business without money.or the access to loans

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I believe people should have the chance to be successful in their pursuits. Kiva gives people all over the world that opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: As an HR Generalist, I recruit new employees to our company, administer health benefits, and provide employee relations assistance when necessary. Its a job that provides a lot of variety and interaction.

lenders.name: 2 PS HOLDINGS, INC.
lenders.loan_because: I want others to have an opportunity to suceed.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a trading company to Europe, Japan, and Korea.

lenders.name: Leslie
lenders.loan_because: everyone could use a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an administrative assistant for a Canadian Government department.  I also am an independent distributor for Xocai, a healthy chocolate.

lenders.name: Janet
lenders.loan_because: it makes people's dreams come true.

lenders.name: Oona
lenders.loan_because: Give someone a fish vs. give them the ability to buy their own fish market. For example.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: my son gave me a gift certificate.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way of helping people to become self-sufficient
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Legal Aid Attorney. I provide legal services to those who normally couldn't afford it.

lenders.name: DEK
lenders.loan_because: no one can succeed without help from friends

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: We can change lives through our small acts
lenders.occupational_info: I help people know how to do their jobs without hurting themselves or the people around them.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: Opportunity is the greatest gift to give.
lenders.occupational_info: i help communities plan and develop strategies to help low-income people.

lenders.name: martine
lenders.loan_because: i want those poor people to have a better life...
lenders.occupational_info: hard  but we have also a lot of possibilitees to make it better

lenders.name: Kyari
lenders.loan_because:
"Seva Paramo Dharma/"  (Sanskrit)
To serve is the most important duty.
lenders.occupational_info: Serve the place which has given you everything, a house to live, school to study, food to eat, friends to be and memories to cherish.

lenders.name: jean
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to set-up an outlet to support the scholarship of the  Daraghuyan Tribe youth (indegenous people)  based in Bukidnon, Philippines http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Hur0I1hh1I.  I will give them free franchise but we need to raise funds to set-up their outlets. The profit that they will make from the operation will sustain part of the schooling expenses of the youth. Please visit our website   www.soupoftheday.weebly.com and see the blog section about the fund raising activity for the lumads.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur who wanted to do business to sustain my goal to help others through job creation and creating business opportunities.  A talent I can share with others, wasted if can't be achieved.  Our business is more on nutritious food abundance awareness.  We aim to empower people through knowing and by knowing to create livelihood.  We concentrate on the power of herbs, a movement in action.

lenders.name: Hassan
lenders.loan_because: a small contribution can make a big change in a person live
lenders.occupational_info: I am Managing Partner of AH & Associates LLP, Maldives specialized in financial consultancy and advisory services.

lenders.name: Valency
lenders.loan_because: I believe little acts make big differences.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm raising 4 children.  I read and sew when I have the time.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: Because when I started my business all the banks turned me down and I received my start by helpful business people giving me a chance to succeed.  Now 12 years later I own 3 different companies all doing very well.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a company that designs websites for small and medium sized businesses.  I also own a promotional marketing distribution company.

lenders.name: abbie
lenders.loan_because: I visited Vietnam last year and was affected deeply by what I experienced.  We simply have to help people who want to improve their lives and are willing to work hard but just don't have the resources that we have access to here in the US.
lenders.occupational_info: I have two young boys and also run my own business.  I work in advertising and marketing and love what I do.

lenders.name: Mohammed
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in peoples' lives. I believe that supporting people to achieve their dreams through their own effeorts is more rewarding and sustainable than giving them handouts.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a banker with a special interest in social entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Bryce
lenders.loan_because: To extend opportunity to those that otherwise may not have access to it.

lenders.name: Kelly
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with everything I need and want to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I run a ship chandlery business delivering deck & engine supply to ships.

lenders.name: Better Life Bags
lenders.loan_because:
I want to make lives better one purse at a time. :)

I believe that a better world is possible and I want to begin by doing my part to alleviate poverty.


"So whatever you wish that others would do to you do also to them for this is the law and the prophets."
- Jesus
lenders.occupational_info: I make customizable bags from my home and give 10% of every transaction to an entrepreneur on the other side of the world.  Every customer receives a picture of the person their bag went to help

lenders.name: Becca
lenders.loan_because: no one should feel forgotten.

lenders.name: Aghar Prem
lenders.loan_because: because this simply act can make someone's life a little bit easier.

lenders.name: Mario
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Kara
lenders.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to sustain a better quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a sales rep.

lenders.name: Nikos & Linda
lenders.loan_because: we believe in positive change and we love how technology enables us to connect directly to a human being somewhere on this Earth that we can help.
lenders.occupational_info:
As restauranteurs, we serve lovely Greek food in an atmosphere of beauty, and hope to be a catalyst for living well. As writers and filmmakers, we explore what connects us all through books, stories and films.
As an educator, we work with schools to promote curriculum that matters, especially that which connects students to life around the world.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: I can, and want to share what I have.  And hopefully those whom I help, through their efforts, will help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm just getting my own consulting business off the ground, sharing my experience and knowledge with companies and organizations who need corporate communication support and services.  From developing strategic communication plans to executing media relations campaigns ... from providing onsite communication and PR support to writing press releases and collateral ... I do what I can to make my clients look good and to make sure they can tell their stories in the best ways possible.

lenders.name: Joyce
lenders.loan_because: In a very small way, I hope I can make a difference to someone else's life.

lenders.name: Mike & Amy
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed with many great opportunities and a wonderful family, hopefully we can share some of  our blessings with other people.

lenders.name: Suzanna & Richard
lenders.loan_because: Microloaning allows us to get involved on a more personal and direct level. We admire people's entrepreneurial spirit the world over, and want to support that to the best of our ability.
lenders.occupational_info: Suzanna works as a freelance graphic designer and travel photographer. Richard is an industrial electrician.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I think this is an AMAZING cause! I really like the idea that women in impoverished communities across the world can change their lot in life with just my $25 loan. I think this is a fantastic way to make a difference in the world. :)
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a retail store while going to school. I am starting my master's degree in the fall. I've already gone to college and recieved a bachelor's degree in Anthropology, the study of people and their cultures. I think that I would like to work for a non-profit organization that makes a difference in the world.

lenders.name: Rick and Carly Hansen
lenders.loan_because: It feels good.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone who is able needs to help out those less fortunate in the world. It is very fulfilling to aid others make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: The bus service is for people with physical disabilities and the elderly that cannot use conventional transit, so we provide a door to door service.

lenders.name: Robert & Victoria
lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someone elses lives!
lenders.occupational_info: We take steel, metal, and with the help of machines make it in to something someone can use or wants.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people build sustainable businesses that change their lives
lenders.occupational_info: real estate- I sell homes

lenders.name: Theo
lenders.loan_because:
My work involves helping businesses here in Australia raise money through equity funding; selling part of their business in exchange for funds. Typically customers feel they need hundreds of thousands of dollars to start a business and to make a difference in their lives. 

I love the fact that through Kiva, such small amounts of money can really make a difference to a whole family and community ... so I'm in!
lenders.occupational_info: I help people raise money they need for their business by selling part of their business.

lenders.name: Brendan
lenders.loan_because: I care about the world.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I care. "Tikkun Olam" - Heal the World.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to do so - I consider it an honor to help others become more independent and self-sustaining. I believe that the place to invest our money when trying to help poverty is into the hands of people who are committed to working hard to help themselves, not just waiting for a handout.

lenders.name: Jed
lenders.loan_because: I am a small biz owner and that is where my heart is, with the little guy all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I make T-Shirts, Posters, and Design Paper Goods.

lenders.name: Mary, Jay and Ian
lenders.loan_because: We are fortunate to be able to. And we love the inspiring stories.
lenders.occupational_info: We are artists, musicians and humanitarians who care a great deal about humanity and our planet, our one and only home.
